type DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl = class inherit TextBox interface IDataGridViewEditingControl

summary.span: 表示可以裝載於 中的文字方塊控制項。

span.span: Represents a text box control that can be hosted in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特殊的類型的實作控制項介面，讓它裝載於當儲存格處於編輯模式。The class is a specialized type of control that implements the interface, allowing it to be hosted in a when the cell is in edit mode. 處理事件，儲存格進入編輯模式時執行的編輯控制項的自訂初始化。Handle the event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode. 若要自訂控制項的顯示特性，設定所傳回之物件的屬性屬性，而不是設定所傳回的控制項屬性屬性。To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此預設建構函式屬性設`false`。This default constructor sets the property to `false`. 應用程式程式碼通常不會明確地建立這個類別的執行個體因為這會自動執行時包含或建立。Application code typically won't explicitly create instances of this class, because this is performed automatically when the containing or is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新物件僅供以重新撰寫為從.NET Framework 4.7.2 開始的.NET framework 版本為目標的應用程式。The new object is only available in applications that are recompiled to target versions of the .NET Framework starting with the .NET Framework 4.7.2. 以舊版.NET Framework 為目標，但.NET Framework 4.7.2 下執行的應用程式可以選擇加入這項功能使用相容性參數。Applications that target an earlier version of the .NET Framework but are running on the .NET Framework 4.7.2 can opt in to this feature by using a compatibility switch. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[What's New in.NET Framework 中的協助工具](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility)。For additional information, see [What's New in Accessibility in the .NET Framework](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility).

summary.span: 取得或設定文字方塊控制項的目前值之格式化表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the formatted representation of the current value of the text box control.

value.span: 表示此控制項的目前值之物件。

span.span: An object representing the current value of this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含該控制項所包含的實際資料。The property contains the actual data contained by the control. 資料會顯示在控制項的文字方塊中的字串。The data is the string shown in the text box of the control. 相反地，屬性是此字串的格式表示法。In contrast, the property is the formatted representation of this string. 在文字方塊中會使用純文字字串，因為這兩個屬性都基本上相同。Since a text box uses plain text strings, these two properties are essentially the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行的標頭資料列的資料列索引為-1。The row index for the column headers row is -1. 共用的資料列的資料列索引也為-1。The row index for a shared row is also -1.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出文字方塊控制項的目前值是否已經變更。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current value of the text box control has changed.

value.span: 如果控制項的值已經變更，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the value of the control has changed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定為`true`表示主控儲存格的值已變更，且儲存格可能需要更新以反映這項變更的值。The property is set to `true` to indicate that the owning cell's value has changed, and the cell may need to be updated to reflect this change in value. 主控儲存格或資料表將會重設這個屬性，以`false`之後更新它自己。The owning cell or table will reset this property to `false` after it has updated itself. 初始化控制項時，此屬性設為`false`。When the control is initialized, this property is set to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可確保會忽略 ENTER 鍵，以便歸位字元和換行不儲存在儲存格的值。This method ensures that the ENTER key is ignored so that carriage return and line feeds aren't stored in the cell value. 這個方法也可讓在按下 CTRL + A 時選取的儲存格內容。This method also allows the cell contents to be selected when CTRL+A is pressed.

permission.span: 立即呼叫端使用這個方法。

span.span: for immediate callers to use this method.
